column1: tossed up wide of off, he leaves this alone
drifting into off, 93kph, good length, he defends on the front foot
drifting into leg, no turn, he's back and tucking this to square leg
looped up on off, 89kph, he drives inside out along the ground to cover

Run out! Horrible start.Weatherald drives straight to cover, they try and pinch a tight one to Henriques, Carey was slow to respond, Henriques throws to the striker's end, Carey dives and he's just short as Philippe whips the bails off!
tossed up, 93kph, on off, he defends on the front foot
full outside off, he square drives straight to point
angled way down the leg side, and called a wide
good length, nipping back in, caught on the crease they appeal for LBW but he might have got an inside edge. It was high too. Hawkeye had it going over
full tailing into middle and leg, he clips this away to deep square
good length, 137kph, but angled down leg, it comes off the thigh pad and rolls behind square
cutter, back of a length, he is back and turning this around the corner to short fine
back of a length on off, he chops it down into the off side, there's some hesitation as they think about one but they opt not to run
drifting down leg, he sweeps behind square piercing the gap between square leg and short fine who are both in the circle
tossed up, he tries to drive hard but mistimes, dragging it down to long on
drifting into leg, he stays leg side and drives inside out through cover! What a stoke. He nailed it in the gap against the drift
tossed up again and he picks the same gap at cover with another cover-drive! Four more
93kph, darted into leg, he gives room, sitting back and pushing to cover-point
good length, darted into leg again, he punches straight to cover this time
134kph, bouncer, too high and called wide
fuller on off, he drives hard but straight to cover
full on off, he drives firmly but straight to mid off
good length, top of off, he glides this down to third man
138kph, good length, off stump, he tries to pull but it's not that short and it goes under the bat and just over off stump!
135kph, full outside off, he launches this inside out over cover-point! It carries over the fence! Wow
good length, fourth stump line, he tries to cut but chops it off the bottom edge close into the off side
133kph, good length on leg, he tucks this through forward square to the sweeper
full outside off, 135kph, he hangs back and stays leg side and throws the hands through it lofting this high and long over long off and it just carries the rope! Great power from Ingram
fired down the leg side and called wide
134kph, full on leg stump, he clips this in the air towards deep midwicket but well short of the man on the rope
slower ball, 107kph, on leg, he turns this slowly through square leg and they push for two but it's the short boundary and the sweeper is in quickly
134kph, short ball, directed at the body, he pulls as he sways to leg and mistimes it behind square
108kph, slower ball, good length across him, deceives him for lack of pace and he misses this. Well bowled
good length, well wide of off, he sits back and places a cut shot into the gap at point
full on middle and off, 128kph, he drives inside out wide of mid off

caught at mid off! Slightly off speed ball, good length, he tries to launch this down the ground, he gets underneath and hits it miles in the air, Henriques has to camp under it at mid off, it swirls, he takes two bites at the catch and hugs it to his chest!
122kph, full outside off, he lofts this high over mid off but gets more on it and it just clears Henriques running back but well short of the rope
length ball leg stump, he heaves this with mow across the line mistiming to deep square leg
127kph, full outside off, he plays a nice check drive to mid off
good length, 115kph, angled into off, he pushes this slowly to mid on
130kph, full outside off, he drags a drive towards long on
angled into leg stump, he clips this to the gap behind square and they run well
short length, he's pulling with control through square leg to the sweeper
126kph, shorter length on off, he sits back and pulls to a wide fine leg
117kph, slower ball, good length, tight to off, he tries to cut but plays over the top of it
98kph, on leg, he skips down and drives to long on
good length, drifting into leg and sliding on, he sits back and forces to cover
shorter on middle, he's back and cutting hard off middle stump to deep cover-point
tossed up, 89kph, on middle and leg, he chips this just past the bowler down to long on
he backs away early, Manenti darts it in following him, but he drives wide of long on and they run well for two
he stays legside again, cuts from leg stump behind point and again they get two more

run out chance and Philippe misses! It slid into the thigh pad and rolled away, Weatherald called him through, Philippe whipped out gathered and threw at the striker's end without looking at just missed! Weatherald wasn't in the picture
slog sweep over deep square! Right in the arc from around the wicket, he was down on one knee and smashing it 92m over the short boundary into the stands
fuller and wider, he drives nicely past cover for a couple
84kph, slower and drifting way wide of off, he tries to cut and misses
tossed way wide of off, he reaches out and slog sweeps flat and hard to the gap at straight midwicket, and it bounces once over the rope!
reverse sweep against the turn, through the gap at backward point! Brilliant batting. He targeted O'Keefe and executed to perfection
134kph, on off, he steps across and whips this through square and he's timed it do well, Hughes running around can't make the save on the rope!
127kph, good length wide off, stays down a touch, he tries to cut but misses
129kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends off the back foot back to the bowler
133kph, good length wide of off, he cuts straight to backward point to the man on the circle
137kph, full outside off, he tries to step across and scoop it, he didn't execute it that well, just balloons it wide of short fine and it falls safe
half-volley on middle, he plays a glorious straight drive and it is stopped by the stumps at the non-striker's! A bit unlucky there. Might have saved two
tossed up, driven back to the bowler
full outside off, he slices a drive in the air towards long off but it's just short of Abbott running in! He picks it up on the half volley
drifting into leg stump, he clips this with the angle through midwicket to the sweeper
tossed up, he skips down and gets to it on the full, driving to long on
drifting into middle and leg, he clips this through midwicket to the sweeper
93kph, shorter length outside off, he punches off the back foot to long off
slower ball, out of the back of the hand, 110kph, he waits and drives straight to cover
slower ball, outside off, 116kph, he picks it and lofts flat down the ground and Abbott slides on the rope coming from long on to make the save
132kph, chest high short ball, he stands up and plays an excellent pull shot to the gap at forward square and the sweeper is forced to run a fair way to cut it off

bowled him! Cracking inswinging yorker! There was a couple of slower balls in the over and this was fired full at speed tailing into off stump, he jammed the bat down but it was too late and it crashes into the base of off!
back of a length slower ball, he's trying to force off the back foot through cover but mistimes it back to the bowler
fuller length, off stump, he drives straight to mid off in the circle
half volley outside off, he plays a cracking drive but straight to cover
full on off, he drives this down to long on. 50 for Weatherald. His second in a row
133kph, short into the hip, he tucks this to the circle at square leg and they run very well to get two
143kph, short and wide and he cracks this hard past point, it races to the rope! He timed this so well
133kph, back of a length on off, he stays back and defends into the off side
fuller on off, he drives nicely straight of mid off and the man on the circle makes a good diving save
tossed up, 87kph, he skips down and drives to cover
looped up slower and he drives straight of cover this time and beats the man for a single
full toss, 85kph, fired into leg, he punches back to the bowler

caught at cover-point! O'Keefe gets his revenge! This was drifting across him, he looked to go inside out over cover again, he struck it well but flat in the air to the man on the circle and the easy head high catch is taken! That's a big blow for the Strikers
drifting into leg, he tucks this off the back foot behind square
85kph, good length on off, he gives himself room and cuts from off stump straight to cover
fuller angling into leg, he drives off a thick inside edge to wide fine leg
117kph, length ball outside off, he skips down the track and drills this over cover cover for four! What a shot
good length leg stump, he clips this nicely to the gap at midwicket
shorter length, he cracks a pull shot to the man at deep square
128kph, angled into off, he drives down to long on
126kph, dragged wide of off stump and it's outside the guideline and called
full into off stump, he clears the left leg and square drives to deep point
tossed up, driven to cover

LBW! Drifting in from around the wicket, he plays for turn and it slides on and hits him infront of off half forward, huge appeal, and the umpire raises the finger. He thought it was going onto to hit leg stump
tossed up outside off, he pushes on the front foot to cover-point
drifting into leg stump, he clips this through midwicket
shorter length outside off, he's back and pulling hard to deep midwicket
tossed up on off, he drives down to long on
missed run out! Slower ball, poked to Manenti at backward point, Wells ran and Valente didn't, Manenti throws to Curran and he can't gather as he's worried about where the stumps are
driven through cover
full into middle stump, he clips this through midwicket to the sweeper
full toss low at leg stump, clipped through midwicket to the sweeper
slower ball on off, he defends to point and they take an easy one this time
Wells shapes to ramp, Curran spots it and goes with a length ball outside off, Wells adjusts and paddles a pull shot fine of short fine leg and runs away for three
tossed up high outside off, inside the guideline and he leaves it
steps across outside off, and sweeps hard into the gap at square leg and finds the rope! good shot
he shapes to ramp and gets it up the full, scooping fine of short fine and they run well for three
length ball outside off, he slaps a length ball to cover
full, tossed up on off, he pushes this down to long on
drifting into middle, he drives hard to long on
full into leg stump, he dances down the track and drives to long on
another missed run out! He drives straight to mid off, Curran on the circle gathers and fires at the non-striker's and Valente gave up! He was miles out if it hit
low full toss, he tries to ramp, he hits it into shoulder and it rolls away safely
full into leg stump, he clips this through midwicket and they run really well for two, there is almost overthrows but Wells had run too far through the crease
full yorker on middle, he jams this out to cover
another brilliant yorker at leg stump, he jams it out off the outside edge to short third man
full toss outside off, he tries to hammer this over cover and misses! That was there to hit
length slower ball, wide of off, he slaps this hard to deep point
slower ball and he picks it and hammers this over deep midwicket and into the crowd!
129kph, short ball, he hammers this flat straight to the man at long on the bounce
low full toss on leg, he wristily gets under it flicks it over forward square clearing the short boundary! Great hands to get that for six!
yorker wide of off, he squeezes this out to cover for one
full toss, driven to mid off and Siddle misfields and allows two! He ran straight over the top of it
shorter leg break outside off, no turn, he punches straight to cover-point
slider, drifting in, he sits back and cuts hard to cover-point
fuller outside off, he square drives just beating point with placement and they run two
shorter length, on off, drifting in and sliding on, he cuts hard to backward point
shorter outside off, he gives room and cuts forward of point and picks the gap this time!
good length, just outside off, he punches off the back foot to cover-point
128kph, good length outside off, he tries to drive on the up through cover with no feet but misses

top edge straight up caught by the keeper Carey! Back of a length on off stump, he tries to pull hard over the leg side, gets a top edge that flies straight up, Carey calls everyone out, it swirls in the air but Carey stays cool and takes the catch
good length on off, he defends with soft hands close into the off side and they pinch one
134kph, back of a length, he tries to force through cover but doesn't time it
thick inside edge just past off stump! Almost a chop on! It was a good length, he just pushed at it with no footwork, got an inside edge and it runs away for four!
back of a length on off, he is back and tucking this to midwicket and they pinch a tight one
150kph, good length across him and he drives magnificently on the up, just punching it past cover and it races away!
back of a length on off, he drops it close in on the off side with soft hands and they run well
angled into middle stump, he tucks this nicely with the angle behind square wide of long leg
144kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot off inside edge onto pad
good length outside off, he tries to heave this over mid on, gets a thick inside edge onto pad, there's some confusion about running but they scamper back as Rashid shies and misses
127kph, full on the pads, he glances this off the middle of the bat straight to short fine leg
130kph, good length outside off, he drives on the up straight to cover
shorter length on middle and leg, he pulls this well behind square and they run back for a second as the sweeper comes around
good length, off stump, 126kph, he pushes firmly on the up wide of mid on for a single
good length on middle, he steps down and gets leg side and frees the arms lofting this down the ground straight over the umpire's head! Lovely swing of the bat
126kph, angled well down the leg side and called wide
132kph, good length into leg stump, he stays leg side and drives to cover
143kph, back of a length and he seizes on the length and pulls powerfully through square leg! Great shot from Hughes. He's in good touch
142kph, full outside off, he drives in the air but in the gap wide of cover and beautifully timed again!
145kph, good length, leg stump, he defends towards mid off and takes one
137kph, bouncer, he ducks but it's too high and called wide
144kph, length outside off, he steps back and across and whips this through midwicket, using the bottom hand to place in the gap!
141kph, full outside off, he places a superb cover-drive, leaning on this wide of mid on and it runs away to the rope!
142kph, full outside off, he pushes this wide of cover for a single
leg break wide of off, 95kph, he pushes on the front foot to backward point
shorter wrong un, he's back and whipping this to deep midwicket
93kph, leg break on middle and off, he defends on the front foot
93kph, leg break fuller, he pushes slowly to mid off and goes with the stroke for an easy one
leg break outside off, he attempts to sweep, hit on the pad but it's outside the line
leg break, good length wide of off, he punches off the back foot to point
good length on off, he drives inside out through cover-point to the sweeper
good length outside off, 137kph, he pushes on the up to backward point and a misfield from Matt Short allows a single
128kph, angled down leg, it comes off the thigh pad and runs fine and Carey makes an excellent diving save. Might have saved three runs there
136kph, good length, top of off, he pulls powerfully along the ground to deep square
139kph, low full toss and crunches a drive on the bounce to Rashid at cover for a crowd catch
116kph, length slower ball, he backs away and tries to pull, it comes off thigh pad and rolls into the off side for one
full outside off, he drives straight to cover
shorter length, outside off, he cuts up and over the infield but it lands well short of deep cover
Bowled him! He tried to slog sweep, slid through a little quicker, a top spinner as well, he played over the top of it and it lights up off stump!
top spinner again, 90kph, outside off he defends to point and they take an easy single
88kph, short ball outside off, he cuts it in the air towards deep cover-point
quicker leg break, he's back and squared up, getting a leading edge back towards the bowler on the bounce
134kph, good length outside off, he tries to force from the crease square, it zips off the surface and beats the edge
Denly backs away, good length follows him, he pushes to cover
full on off, 139kph, he drives straight to mid off
short ball, on middle, he pulls hard but straight to the man in the deep at square leg
142kph, very full outside off, he pushes on the front foot to backward point
attempted yorker, he pushes to midwicket, Short gathers and throws and hits the one stump he could see but Henriques just beat the throw!
steps outside off, it's fired behind his legs and just misses leg stump and isn't called wide! Good call. He changed his stance
good length wrong un, he doesn't read it, he chops it down beneath his legs
shorter length, he is back and pulling hard into the gap at forward square leg and he finally finds the rope!
shorter and quicker outside off, he pulls wide of long on and they call two immediately and get there easily
flatter and fuller outside off, 95kph, he's back and across and working this to midwicket
wrong un, good length on off, he defends to point and they pinch an easy one
slower ball, he's back and working this behind square to the man in the deep
slower ball again, good length, he turns this from off stump behind square leg
130kph, fuller angled into off he drives with the full face to long on
130kph, full on off, he drives firmly to long off
dropped by Valente! Slower ball, Denly swings hard and gets under it skying it straight up to midwicket, Valente calls everyone out of it, gets to it and drops it!
slower ball, on middle and off, he steps across and sweeps it fine of short fine and it runs to the rope!
flipper, wide of off, he cuts off the edge and it flies away to third man for four! Siddle almost hauled it in but couldn't get there
tossed up outside off, he swing through the line, lofting it straight of long on and he beats the man who is wide! Four more!
full on off, he nails this wide of long on for six! He got all of this one! It was right in the slot and he flushed it
full into leg stump, he drives along the ground to deep long on
full toss, clipped down to long on
94kph, drifting into middle, he drives slowly past cover who can't knock it down, it was hit slowly enough not to get to long off quickly and they run two. 50 for Denly

stumped! Off a wide! He stepped outside off, it tried to sweep, Rashid slid it down leg, Carey moves across and takes it brilliantly and whips the bails off as Henriques foot slides out! That is world class keeping from Carey! He was so quick
96kph, top spinner on leg, he glances this off the back foot to short fine
full top spinner on middle, he works this to midwicket, they push for two, Neser throws to the striker's end and hits but Denly beat the throw
leg break outside off, he defends on the front foot
good length leg break outside off, he dabs fine of short third man and Siddle makes the save

edged and caught at slip! Sensational from Rashid and brave to have the slip in! Good length leg break on off, he went to push it to long on, but closed the face slightly, got an edge and it went straight to Short at slip. Easy catch.
94kph, he steps across his stumps and paddle sweeps from middle stump! It runs fine for four! What courage! If he missed that he was plumb.
141kph, good length on off, he pushes firmly to cover
147kph, full into middle, he drives down to long on
full into middle and leg, he steps across and whips this well straight to deep backward square
124kph, slower ball short and wide and crunched through point! He smoked this and the sweeper had no chance of cutting it off
bouncer, 136kph, he ducks underneath it
146kph, good length wide of off, he slices this off the front foot wide of third man and they push back for two
94kph, top spinner outside off, he pushes this down to long on
94kph, leg break outside off, he doesn't pick it, it zips past the edge
leg break, 93kph, he steps across and pushes this to the circle at midwicket, Philippe is lightning and he races back for two
89kph, drifting into leg, he tucks this wide of short fine
93kph, leg break on middle, he steps across and sweeps to short fine
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting to deep point
knee high full toss on off, he pushes this into the gap at point
116kph, slower ball, he steps outside leg and lofts this inside out over mid off! What a stroke from the youngster!
wide yorker, he jams down and bounces it over the keeper's head for a couple
full yorker, he squeezes this out through point
shorter length, he pulls to midwicket and they sprint through
full toss at off stump, he shapes to ramp scoop, gets it high on the bat but gets enough of it to clear the keeper and falls safe fine of long leg
full on middle, he drives nicely straight of long on but they don't take on Wells who races in off the rope
slower ball, full toss on off, he whips this into the gap at square midwicket and they get another easy two
length ball launched over midwicket into the upper deck! Incredible strike! Just jumped on the length, held his shape and clubbed it.
backs away, too far outside leg, Neser fires wide of off and he can't reach it, through to Carey
bouncer outside off, but way too high, called wide. he tried to upper cut but couldn't reach it
133kph, yorker on off, he bunts this away through cover
126kph full outside off, he drives inside out to deep cover-point
leg break on middle, he pushes to midwicket who is now in the circle to cut the single
short and wide and hammered, a great cut short through cover-point and the sweeper is too square!
shorter top spinner, he's back and defending to square leg for a single
short wrong un down leg, he pulls to short fine and Stanlake dives to save extra runs
good length wrong un, he plays it off the pitch, working through square leg to the gap for two
leg break, 93kph, on off, he defends to midwicket
full into off stump, he jams this out to mid on
134kph, half-volley, he lofts this down the ground for four! Brilliant innings from Philippe!
